alert.note: Alert for Christian; Dallas; Greene; Stone; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Webster, southwestern Dallas, northwestern Christian, north central Stone and Greene Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 400 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Battlefield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield... Nixa... Ozark... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Strafford... Clever... Fair Grove... Billings... Fremont Hills... Brookline... Elkland... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Turners... Northview... Olive... Boaz... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 65 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
